official_title: A bill to require at least seven members of the Supreme Court to concur in any decision of the Court declaring a Federal or State law unconstitutional.

summary.text: Constitutional Review Act - Requires the concurrence of at least seven members of the Supreme Court for any decision declaring a Federal or State law unconstitutional under the Court's appellate jurisdiction.

titles.title: A bill to require at least seven members of the Supreme Court to concur in any decision of the Court declaring a Federal or State law unconstitutional.
